Class CheckoutController

java.lang.Object
cop4331.controller.CheckoutController
public class CheckoutController extends Object

Handles the checkout process for a customer including generating an invoice, processing payment, and saving an order.

Author:
Benjamin Carver

    • CheckoutController

      public CheckoutController(CustomerDashboardView dashboardView)

      Constructs a CheckoutController object.

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • generateInvoice

      public String generateInvoice(ShoppingCart cart)

      Takes a User's cart and produces an invoice with product details, quantities, and the total cost.

      Parameters:
      cart - The User's cart.
      Returns:
      The invoice in String form.

    • processPayment

      public boolean processPayment(String cardNumber, String expiryDate, String cvv)

      Simulates payment processing using provided information.

      Parameters:
      cardNumber - The card's number.
      expiryDate - The card's expiry date.
      cvv - The card's security code.
      Returns:
      true, always simulates successful payment.

    • saveOrder

      public void saveOrder(Customer customer, ShoppingCart cart, String invoice)

      Saves the order to the User's account.

      Parameters:
      customer - The User who made the order.
      cart - The User's cart.
      invoice - The invoice generated for the order.

    • checkout

      public void checkout(Customer customer, ShoppingCart cart, String cardNumber, String expiryDate, String cvv)

      Performs the checkout process for the customer.

      Parameters:
      customer - The customer performing the checkout.
      cart - The customer's shopping cart.
      cardNumber - The card number for payment.
      expiryDate - The expiry date of the card.
      cvv - The CVV security code of the card.
